app.name: Gym App
app.noMoreWorkouts: You have reached the end of the feed!!

notifications.alert: Now it will ask you to accept notifications, click yes
notifications.denied: You have denied notifications, you can enable them in your browser settings

editProfile.changeProfilePicture: Click or drag to change profile picture

workout.addWorkoutInfo: Every 45 minutes of workout earns you 1 point. You can only enter today's workout.

longWorkoutDialog.title: Woo!
longWorkoutDialog.text: That's a long workout! Did you actually workout for that long?

workout.dragAndDrop: Drag & drop an image or video here, or click to select files
workout.max5Files: You can upload a maximum of 5 files

deleteComment.title: Delete comment
deleteComment.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

deleteWorkout.title: Delete workout
deleteWorkout.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this workout?

pwa.newContentAvailable: New content available, click on reload button to update

wall.title: waa fratm!
wall.instructions: To use Gym App, please ensure you are on a mobile device and have the Progressive Web App (PWA) installed.
wall.stepsTitle: Here are the steps to install the app:
wall.redirectMessage: Please switch to mobile and install the app.
